enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve transferring assets between sub-accounts and share similar parameter structures.
Both methods involve transferring assets and share similar parameter structures, particularly the 'asset' and 'amount' parameters.
The 'queryUniversalTransfer' method returns transfer history, which can be used to verify the success of the 'universalTransfer' method.
The 'spotTransferHistory' method returns transfer history, which can be used to verify the success of the 'universalTransfer' method, especially for spot transfers.
